channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i66.photobucket.com/albums/h251/tx_rangers8/10-1.jpg[/img]
[u][b][size=14pt]Makers/Owners:[/size][/b][/u] Jake - Server Creator, coder. (Jake is me.) Rachel X Pkz - Co-Owner. (She is really nice, and helpful.)
[u][b][size=14pt]Administrators:[/size][/b][/u] Old Nite [u]Cory Black Melee I Awakened I
[u][b][size=14pt]Moderators:[/size][/b][/u] Bum Gizmo Pkpkpk [size=14pt][u][b] Some Information:[/b][/u][/size] [b]Server name:[/b] Augeas - - It is a Silab Server. ;) [u]Server Base:[/u] Project Czar Hello everyone, Incognito (Jake) here. I want to inform all of you of my server. It's really great for PKing, since we have 3 PKing areas. We have great administrators and moderators, but I do want to warn you that some of them can get a little, well, let's just say angry, heh. We have updates nearly every day! Come join and see how you like it.
[size=14pt][u][b]Features:[/b][/u][/size] -3 PKing areas. (Multi, 1v1, and Mage Bank) -Full Magic -Full working special attacks -Lots of items -New updates nearly everyday -Full cooking (on a range) -Full Range -Full Fishing -Crafting -Good Economy (Party Hats soon to be discontinued!) -Working Vengeance -New starting location, added 3/18/08 -Fully working Sparkling Pool + Statues! -New unique training area -Custom Skillcape emotes -and more!
[size=14pt][u][b]Updates that are coming soon:[/b][/u][/size] -New area for thieving - 2% -Agility - 45% -Herblore - 0% -Working potions - 0% -Adding some items - 32% -::starter - 20%
[size=14pt][b][u]Some useful commands:[/u][/b][/size] ::suggest (Send a suggestion to me, Ingame) ::1v1 ::multi ::train ::yell ::jad ::cather ::home ::thieve ::wc ::slayer ::kqueen
[size=14pt][u][b]Pictures of the server:[/b][/u][/size]
[IMG]http://i66.photobucket.com/albums/h251/tx_rangers8/1-43.jpg[/img]

Please comment, if you wish to say anything. :) Thank you for taking some time to read it. :)

item.title: ~Augeas~
item.dc:creator: @Incognito Incognito
item.description:
@Incognito wrote:

[center]

[size=14pt]Makers/Owners:[/size]
Jake - Server Creator, coder. (Jake is me.)
Rachel X Pkz - Co-Owner. (She is really nice, and helpful.)

[size=14pt]Administrators:[/size]
Old Nite
[u]Cory
Black Melee
I Awakened I

[size=14pt]Moderators:[/size]
Bum Gizmo
Pkpkpk
[size=14pt]
Some Information:[/size]
Server name: Augeas - - It is a Silab Server.
Server Base: Project Czar
Hello everyone, Incognito (Jake) here. I want to inform all of you of my server. It’s really great for PKing, since we have 3 PKing areas. We have great administrators and moderators, but I do want to warn you that some of them can get a little, well, let’s just say angry, heh. We have updates nearly every day! Come join and see how you like it.

[size=14pt]Features:[/size]
-3 PKing areas. (Multi, 1v1, and Mage Bank)
-Full Magic
-Full working special attacks
-Lots of items
-New updates nearly everyday
-Full cooking (on a range)
-Full Range
-Full Fishing
-Crafting
-Good Economy (Party Hats soon to be discontinued!)
-Working Vengeance
-New starting location, added 3/18/08
-Fully working Sparkling Pool + Statues!
-New unique training area
-Custom Skillcape emotes
-and more!

[size=14pt]Updates that are coming soon:[/size]
-New area for thieving - 2%
-Agility - 45%
-Herblore - 0%
-Working potions - 0%
-Adding some items - 32%
-::starter - 20%

[size=14pt]Some useful commands:[/size]
::suggest (Send a suggestion to me, Ingame)
::1v1
::multi
::train
::yell
::jad
::cather
::home
::thieve
::wc
::slayer
::kqueen

[size=14pt]Pictures of the server:[/size]

[hr]

Please comment, if you wish to say anything. Thank you for taking some time to read it.

IF THIS IS THE WRONG SECTION, I’M SORRY, AND YOU CAN DELETE IT IF IT IS!

Read full topic
